verses.verse: Then all Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> themselves to David <S%H1732><s%> unto Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H6106><s%>, we are thy bone and thy flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

In times <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>, even when Saul <S%H7586><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%>, it was thou that leddest out <S%H3318><s%> and broughtest in <S%H935><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto thee <S%H7462><s%>, Thou shalt be shepherd of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and thou shalt be prince <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H1571><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

So all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> to Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; and David <S%H1732><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and they anointed <S%H4886><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> (the same is Jebus <S%H2982><s%>); and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, were there.

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jebus <S%H2982><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, Thou shalt not come <S%H935><s%> in hither <S%H1732><s%>. Nevertheless David took <S%H3920><s%> the stronghold <S%H4686><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; the same is the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Whosoever smiteth <S%H5221><s%> the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> shall be chief <S%H7218><s%> and captain <S%H8269><s%>. And Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> first <S%H7223><s%>, and was made chief <S%H7218><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the stronghold <S%H4679><s%>; therefore they called <S%H7121><s%> it the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, from Millo <S%H4407><s%> even round about <S%H5439><s%>; and Joab <S%H3097><s%> repaired <S%H2421><s%> the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> waxed <S%H3212><s%> greater <S%H1980><s%> and greater <S%H1419><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts was with him <S%H6635><s%>.

Now these are the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom David <S%H1732><s%> had <S%H2388><s%>, who showed themselves strong with him in his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, together with all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to make him king <S%H4427><s%>, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> concerning Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And this is the number <S%H4557><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom David <S%H1732><s%> had <S%H3434><s%>: Jashobeam, the son of a Hachmonite <S%H2453><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the thirty <S%H7991><s%>; he lifted up <S%H5782><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and slew <S%H2491><s%> them at one <S%H259><s%> time <S%H6471><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%>, the Ahohite <S%H266><s%>, who was one of the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

He was with David <S%H1732><s%> at Pasdammim <S%H6450><s%>, and there the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were gathered together <S%H622><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, where was a plot <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And they stood <S%H3320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the plot <S%H2513><s%>, and defended <S%H5337><s%> it <S%H5221><s%>, and slew the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them by a great <S%H1419><s%> victory <S%H8668><s%>.

And three <S%H7969><s%> of the thirty <S%H7970><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men went down <S%H3381><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, into the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Adullam <S%H5725><s%>; and the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> was then in the stronghold <S%H4686><s%>, and the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> was then in Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> longed <S%H183><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Oh that one would give me water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> of the well <S%H953><s%> of Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>, which is by the gate <S%H8179><s%>!

And the three <S%H7969><s%> brake through <S%H1234><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and drew <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the well <S%H953><s%> of Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>, that was by the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H935><s%>, and brought it to David <S%H1732><s%>: but David <S%H1732><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> thereof <S%H5258><s%>, but poured it out unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%>, My God <S%H430><s%> forbid <S%H2486><s%> it me <S%H6213><s%>, that I should do this <S%H2063><s%>: shall I drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> that have put their lives in jeopardy <S%H5315><s%>? for with the jeopardy of their lives <S%H5315><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> it <S%H14><s%>. Therefore he would not drink <S%H8354><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>. These things did the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

And Abishai <S%H52><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%>, he was chief <S%H7218><s%> of the three <S%H7969><s%>; for he lifted up <S%H5782><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and slew <S%H2491><s%> them <S%H8034><s%>, and had a name among the three <S%H7969><s%>.

Of the three <S%H7969><s%>, he was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than the two <S%H8147><s%>, and was made their captain <S%H8269><s%>: howbeit he attained <S%H935><s%> not to the first three <S%H7969><s%>.

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of a valiant <S%H2428><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Kabzeel <S%H6909><s%>, who had done mighty <S%H7227><s%> deeds <S%H6467><s%>, he slew <S%H5221><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H739><s%> of Ariel of Moab <S%H4124><s%>: he went down <S%H3381><s%> also and slew <S%H5221><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the midst of a pit <S%H953><s%> in time <S%H3117><s%> of snow <S%H7950><s%>.

And he slew <S%H5221><s%> an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> of great stature <S%H4060><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high <S%H4713><s%>; and in the Egyptian's hand <S%H3027><s%> was a spear <S%H2595><s%> like a weaver <S%H707><s%>'s beam <S%H4500><s%>; and he went down <S%H3381><s%> to him with a staff <S%H7626><s%>, and plucked <S%H1497><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> out of the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> him with his own spear <S%H2595><s%>.
These things did <S%H6213><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%>, and had a name <S%H8034><s%> among the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

Behold <S%H2009><s%>, he was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than the thirty <S%H7970><s%>, but he attained <S%H935><s%> not to the first three <S%H7969><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> him over his guard <S%H4928><s%>.

Also the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of the armies <S%H2428><s%>: Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%>, Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> of Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>,
Shammoth <S%H8054><s%> the Harorite <S%H2033><s%>, Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite <S%H6397><s%>,
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite <S%H8621><s%>, Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anathothite <S%H6069><s%>,
Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%>, Ilai <S%H5866><s%> the Ahohite <S%H266><s%>,
Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>, Heled <S%H2466><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baanah <S%H1196><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>,
Ithai <S%H863><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ribai <S%H7380><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%>,
Hurai <S%H2360><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of Gaash <S%H1608><s%>, Abiel <S%H22><s%> the Arbathite <S%H6164><s%>,
Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the Baharumite <S%H978><s%>, Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the Shaalbonite <S%H8170><s%>,
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashem <S%H2044><s%> the Gizonite <S%H1493><s%>, Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shagee <S%H7681><s%> the Hararite <S%H2043><s%>,
Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sacar <S%H7940><s%> the Hararite <S%H2043><s%>, Eliphal <S%H465><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ur <S%H218><s%>,
Hepher <S%H2660><s%> the Mecherathite <S%H4382><s%>, Ahijah <S%H281><s%> the Pelonite <S%H6397><s%>,
Hezro <S%H2695><s%> the Carmelite <S%H3761><s%>, Naarai <S%H5293><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ezbai <S%H229><s%>,
360 <S%H3100><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, Mibhar <S%H4006><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hagri <S%H1905><s%>,
Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%>, Naharai <S%H5171><s%> the Berothite <S%H1307><s%>, the armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%>,
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the Ithrite <S%H3505><s%>, Gareb <S%H1619><s%> the Ithrite <S%H3505><s%>,
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, Zabad <S%H2066><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahlai <S%H304><s%>,
Adina <S%H5721><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiza <S%H7877><s%> the Reubenite <S%H7206><s%>, a chief <S%H7218><s%> of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and thirty with him <S%H7970><s%>,
Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maacah <S%H4601><s%>, and Joshaphat <S%H3146><s%> the Mithnite <S%H4981><s%>,
Uzzia <S%H5814><s%> the Ashterathite <S%H6254><s%>, Shama <S%H8091><s%> and Jeiel <S%H3273><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hotham <S%H2369><s%> the Aroerite <S%H6200><s%>,
Jediael <S%H3043><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimri <S%H8113><s%>, and Joha <S%H3109><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, the Tizite <S%H8491><s%>,

Eliel <S%H447><s%> the Mahavite <S%H4233><s%>, and Jeribai <S%H3403><s%>, and Joshaviah <S%H3145><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elnaam <S%H493><s%>, and Ithmah <S%H3495><s%> the Moabite <S%H4125><s%>,
Eliel <S%H447><s%>, and Obed <S%H5744><s%>, and Jaasiel <S%H3300><s%> the Mezobaite <S%H4677><s%>.
